use_case.description: the client product owner and business owner collaboratively develop an approved, actionable project schedule. From there, the owner then assigns line items to vendors.

use_case.requirements: the project needs a clearly defined set of requirements
the owner must assign line items for vendors to begin development

use_case.description: Vendors receive assigned line items from business owner. Vendors then begin development

use_case.requirements: Vendors must log hours and costs associated with progress
vendors must give updates on line item progress
vendors must indicate the actual level of effort spent on development

use_case.description: As development progresses, the project owner needs to track project costs and progress. If there is an adjustment needed, the PM should alert the owner. THe owner then decides how to adjust priorities and budget.

use_case.requirements: PM and owner need views of accurate, updated information.

use_case.description: the client needs to autonomously view project information. the information needs to be up-to-date. this allows the business to continue working on the project.
the business owner needs to view updated information in order to make necessary adjustments, track the project, update the client, and accurately invoice

use_case.requirements: the client must receive project updates for collaboration
the business owner must see updated project information to manage the project.
project updates must be recorded by vendors and accumulated

use_case.description: the business owner needs the ability to generate relevant project reports with up-to-date information.

use_case.requirements: system must have capability to generate useful reports

use_case.description: the business needs the ability to quickly invoice the client for current costs.
the client needs the ability to review and pay the invoice

use_case.requirements: system must import current unbilled costs to an invoice
client must be able to review and pay invoice through system
